title: Mini-Ep 243: The Joy of the Small Task
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 243: The Joy of the Small Task
itunes:subtitle: Kate’s got another show she loves and and Doree wakes up to the idea of working out early in the morning. Then, listeners ask if it’s silly to change your routine for a new haircut, call in with advice from a mosquito expert, and tell Kate they can NOT...
description:
Kate’s got another show she loves and and Doree wakes up to the idea of working out early in the morning. Then, listeners ask if it’s silly to change your routine for a new haircut, call in with advice from a mosquito expert, and tell Kate they can NOT with her tv watching history. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
